sentences.en: The landscape has remained predominantly rural in appearance.
sentences.cn: 该风景看上去主要保留了乡村风貌。

sentences.en: She works in a predominantly male environment.
sentences.cn: 她在一个男性居多的环境里工作。

sentences.en: She writes about her experiences as a black girl in a predominantly white city.
sentences.cn: 她写的是自己身为一个黑人姑娘在以白人为主的城市里的经历。
